verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H7919>considereth<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H1800>poor:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> him, and keep him <S%H2421>alive;<s%> and he shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and thou wilt <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him unto the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> him <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6210>bed<s%> of <S%H1741>languishing:<s%> thou wilt <S%H2015>make<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4904>bed<s%> in his <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me: <S%H7495>heal<s%> my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee.
Mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> of me, <S%H4970>When<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish?<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> me, he <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathereth<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to itself; when he <S%H3318>goeth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> he <S%H1696>telleth<s%> it.
All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me: <S%H5921>against<s%> me do they <S%H2803>devise<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

An <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease,<s%> say they, cleaveth <S%H3332>fast<s%> unto him: and now <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H7901>lieth<s%> he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>

Yea, <S%H1571><s%> mine own familiar <S%H7965>friend,<s%> <S%H376><s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H982>trusted,<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> of my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> hath lifted <S%H1431>up<s%> his <S%H6119>heel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
But <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, and raise me <S%H6965>up,<s%> that I may <S%H7999>requite<s%> them.
By <S%H2063>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> thou <S%H2654>favorest<s%> me, <S%H3588>because<s%> mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7321>triumph<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me.
And as for <S%H589>me,<s%> thou <S%H8551>upholdest<s%> me in mine <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> and <S%H5324>settest<s%> me before thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4480>everlasting,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> and <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting.<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
